item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world using Hugo ðŸ™‚ 1 2 def hello_world(): print("Hello world") Installing Hugo is pretty easy, but configuring Hugo is not easy at all ðŸ™‚. Anyway, here’s my blog. I try to write at least a post in a week or two, just to have here updated ðŸ™‚. Have a good time.
